Included in our wedding: Ukrainian rushnyk: ceremonial cloth to step on together, in = partnership (not traditional meaning, we made it ours) Irish ring warming: guests pass rings, give wish/blessing Handmade paper flowers w/ written names of ppl we lost so they could be with us https://t.co/1MKib0MSf1
I realized through this wedding (and, through my death studies/work), how important ceremony and honouring any life transition is. It can be meaningful, personal, and align with your values.
